class Error[source]

Error() :: Exception

Base class for exceptions in this module.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class SomethingNotSetError[source]

SomethingNotSetError(where, what) :: Error

Exception raised for errors in the input of transformations.

Attributes:
    where -- where is something missing
    what     -- what is missing
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ProjectionNotSetError[source]

ProjectionNotSetError(where, what) :: SomethingNotSetError

Exception raised for errors in the input of transformations.

Attributes:
    where -- where is something missing
    what     -- what is missing
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GeoTransformNotSetError[source]

GeoTransformNotSetError(where, what) :: SomethingNotSetError

Exception raised for errors in the input of transformations.

Attributes:
    where -- where is something missing
    what     -- what is missing
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class KMASpiceError[source]

KMASpiceError() :: Exception

Base class for exceptions in this module.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

SPointNotSetError() :: KMASpiceError

Base class for exceptions in this module.
